subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage caps that reset periodically (e.g., every 3-5 hours), significantly higher than free tier
5x more usage than the free tier, with limits that reset approximately every 8 hours

pricing_analysis.most_efficient: DeepSeek V2 (Input: $0.55/M, Output: $2.19/M) for top-tier performance, among listed leaders Claude 3.5 Sonnet is most efficient
pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High (estimated >70% of professional individual users favor $20/month subscriptions for convenience over direct API billing)
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price competition and token cost reduction, led by new entrants like DeepSeek and Qwen, are forcing established players (OpenAI, Anthropic) to launch more efficient models (e.g., GPT-4o) at lower prices. A bifurcation is emerging: high-end frontier models around $3-$5 per million input tokens, and highly-competitive open-source and Chinese models under $1 per million input tokens. The $20/month subscription for premium chat access is the dominant consumer model.
